overview: In Lost Dads, hot muscle daddies Drew Sebastian and Ryan Carter turn a night of drunken sex into a morning of steamy roadside motel fucking. Then sexy Texan stud Wesley Woods picks up hairy and hung Jack Dixon and offers him his perfect man hole to ride. When Jack Dyer gets lost in the desert, it's horny stud Lincoln Tunnel who's there to rescue him. Clay Towers runs out of gas but not out of steam when he gets a chance to fuck sexy Liam Greer. Then daddy bear Brian Davilla and Jake Morgan meet up on the road and start some outdoor play before taking it inside to finish the job.
title: Lost Dads
